sentences.sentence: For once Roose Bolton's voice was loud enough to carry.
sentences.translation: 这一次卢斯·波顿的声音足够响亮。

sentences.sentence: Roose Bolton had posted guards at the kitchen door. With so many mouths to feed, every scrap of food was precious.
sentences.translation: 卢斯·波顿派人看守着厨房的们，有这么多张口，没一点食物都显得尤其珍贵。
